Text: PRC ReviewsFYI I have chosen you all as reviewers for my Performance Review The feedback response time for Human Resources has been excelerated Please review me no later than this Friday May th Thanks Nedre

AttorneyEnergyTelecommunicationsanyone in your area have a need for an attorney with this background Let me know if there is any interest Nedre Forwarded by Nedre StramblerHOUECT on AM From Ryan Seleznov ENRON AM Sent by Ryan NRON To Nedre CT Joyce BarrettENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject AttorneyEnergyTelecommunications NedreJoyce dont know if you have a need Would one of you mind getting back with Stanley Thanks Ryan Forwarded by Ryan SeleznovCorpEnron on AM Stanley J Ross arristerReferralscom on PM Please respond to arristerReferralscom To Ryan Seleznov cc Subject AttorneyEnergyTelecommunications Ryan I trust you will wish to refer the attached resume of John E Benedict Esq to the appropriate business group who would have an interest in a wellcredentialed and experienced attorney whose practice areas have focused on energy and telecommunications This resume is provided to you in confidence and I would be pleased to respond to any questions you may have regarding this referral Please take a moment to let me know what attorney positions are currently open at Enron Best regards Stanley Ross Regards Stanley Ross BENEDICT John res doc
